title: Google\Cloud\Security\PrivateCA\V1beta1\CertificateDescription
name: CertificateDescription
description:
A [CertificateDescription][google.cloud.security.privateca.v1beta1.CertificateDescription] describes an X.509 certificate or CSR that has been issued, as an alternative to using ASN.1 / X.509.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.security.privateca.v1beta1.CertificateDescription

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.subject_description
params.description: Describes some of the values in a certificate that are related to the subject and lifetime.

params.name: data.config_values
params.description: Describes some of the technical fields in a certificate.

params.name: data.public_key
params.description: The public key that corresponds to an issued certificate.

params.name: data.subject_key_id
params.description: Provides a means of identifiying certificates that contain a particular public key, per https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc5280#section-4.2.1.2.

params.name: data.authority_key_id
params.description: Identifies the subject_key_id of the parent certificate, per https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc5280#section-4.2.1.1

params.name: data.crl_distribution_points
params.description: Describes a list of locations to obtain CRL information, i.e. the DistributionPoint.fullName described by https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc5280#section-4.2.1.13

params.name: data.aia_issuing_certificate_urls
params.description: Describes lists of issuer CA certificate URLs that appear in the "Authority Information Access" extension in the certificate.
